sections:
482 of the Bharatiya
Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita
full_text:
IN THE COURT OF THE SESSIONS JUDGE,
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
PRESENT : SMT. NAZEERA.S, SESSIONS JUDGE
Saturday, 1 day of March, 2025/ 10" day of Phalguna, 1946.
CRIMINAL M.C. No.567/2025
Petitioner :-
Al-Ameen., aged 31 years,
S/o Ameer, Al Ameen Manzil
Karichara, Pallippuram P.O.,
Thiruvananthapuram
(By Advocate Ashok P. Nair.)
Respondents:-
1 Deputy Superintendent of Police, Attingal
2 Station House Officer, Attingal Police Station.
3 Station House Officer, Mangalapuram Police Station.
4, Station House Officer, Kallambalam Police Station.
5 State of Kerala.
(By Public Prosecutor Dr. T. Geenakumari)
This Crl.M.C. came up for hearing on 28/2/2025 and the court on the
1/3/2025 passed the following :
ORDER
This is a petition filed under Section 482 of the Bharatiya
Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita, seeking pre-arrest bail.
2. The petition is filed seeking an order of pre-arrest bail on
apprehension of arrest on a complaint as against the petitioner.
Criminal M.C.No.567/2025 1/2

3. Notice in this application is given to the Public Prosecutor. The
Inspector of Police, Kallambalam Police Station filed report through Public
Prosecutor stating that no case is registered against the petitioner. It is
further submitted that, the petitioner was an accused earlier in some other
cases, and those are all in committal stage, and at present, there is no
complaint against him. So in view of the same, the learned Public
Prosecutor submitted that, there is no intention to arrest the petitioner at
present. So the apprehension of the petitioner that he is likely to be arrested
by the respondents in connection with a non bailable offence at this stage is
without any basis and he is not entitled to get pre-arrest bail u/s. 482 of
Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita and the petition is liable to be
dismissed.

In the result, this petition is dismissed.
(Dictated to the Confidential Assistant, transcribed and typed by him, corrected and
pronounced by me in Open Court on this the 1* day of March, 2025)
Sd/-
NAZEERA.S
SESSIONS JUDGE
True Copy By Order
(Copies : 4)
Typed by: Anupama
Compared by: Rifa FCS : SHERISTADAR
Criminal M.C.No.567/2025 2/2

Criminal M.C.No.567/2025
Dated 1/3/2025
Criminal M.C.No.567/2025 3/2
